summary: The diff modifies 11 frontend files addressing both REQ-1 (Dashboard) and REQ-2 (Cases list). DashboardView.tsx properly wires useGetAllCases() and useGetDashboard() hooks to rendering logic. CasesListView.tsx properly destructures useGetAllCases() result. CaseCard.tsx correctly accepts surgeryCase prop and uses task data. ChecklistEditor.tsx correctly receives and renders task data with WorkflowIcon. WorkflowIcon.tsx maps task types to icon components. useQueries.ts has correct hook implementations. checklist.ts provides proper data mapping. No backend Motoko files are modified. The immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui) are not edited.
